name: The Gladiator's Freedom
description:
Play as a gladiator and fight monsters to earn your freedom!

Level up and get stronger after every match in order to survive!
Opponents are randomly generated... see how crazy they can be!
Free to Play! No ads or in-game purchases!
Play offline!
After you get your freedom you can keep battling to see how long you can survive! Try to unlock all the milestones!

Feel free to give me feedback on Instagram! http://instagram.com/2dashboone
